javax.swing

Class JOptionPane.ModalPrivilegedAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.JOptionPane.ModalPrivilegedAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrivilegedAction<Method>
    Enclosing class:
    JOptionPane

    private static class JOptionPane.ModalPrivilegedAction
extends Object
implements PrivilegedAction<Method>
    Retrieves a method from the provided class and makes it accessible.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public Method run()
        Description copied from interface: PrivilegedAction
        Performs the computation. This method will be called by AccessController.doPrivileged after enabling privileges.
        Specified by:
        run in interface PrivilegedAction<Method>
        Returns:
        a class-dependent value that may represent the results of the computation. Each class that implements PrivilegedAction should document what (if anything) this value represents.
        See Also:
        AccessController.doPrivileged(PrivilegedAction), AccessController.doPrivileged(PrivilegedAction, AccessControlContext)
